price: Sε (boniayεfoͻ) no hu wo a wͻdi wo ho fεw sε: ”Enti woi na Nyankopͻn ayi no sε Ɔsomafoͻ?
arabic: وَإِذَا رَأَوۡكَ إِن يَتَّخِذُونَكَ إِلَّا هُزُوًا أَهَٰذَا ٱلَّذِي بَعَثَ ٱللَّهُ رَسُولًا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā ra-awka in yattakhidhūnaka illā huzuwan ahādhā alladhī baʿatha al-lahu rasūlan
